tasks.label: Clean and Run SignInUI
tasks.command: find . -name "*.class" -type f -delete && javac -cp .:/Users/mohammedalzuaa/Downloads/mysql-connector-j-9.3.0/mysql-connector-j-9.3.0.jar SignInUI.java && java -cp .:/Users/mohammedalzuaa/Downloads/mysql-connector-j-9.3.0/mysql-connector-j-9.3.0.jar SignInUI
tasks.detail: Clean .class files, compile SignInUI.java, and run it.
